    • 方法详细资料

      • create

        public static <T> T create(java.lang.Class<T> intf,
                           java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler h)
        Returns an instance of a proxy class for the specified interfaces that dispatches method invocations to the specified invocation handler.
        类型参数:
        T - anyType
        参数:
        intf - the interface for the proxy to implement
        h - the invocation handler to dispatch method invocations to
        返回:
        a proxy instance with the specified invocation handler of a proxy class that is defined by the specified class loader and that implements the specified interfaces
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the restrictions on the parameters that may be passed to getProxyClass are violated
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the interfaces array argument or any of its elements are null, or if the invocation handler, h, is null

      • create

        public static <T> T create(java.lang.ClassLoader loader,
                           java.lang.Class<T> intf,
                           java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler h)
        Returns an instance of a proxy class for the specified interfaces that dispatches method invocations to the specified invocation handler.
        类型参数:
        T - anyType
        参数:
        loader - the class loader to define the proxy class
        intf - the interface for the proxy to implement
        h - the invocation handler to dispatch method invocations to
        返回:
        a proxy instance with the specified invocation handler of a proxy class that is defined by the specified class loader and that implements the specified interfaces
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the restrictions on the parameters that may be passed to getProxyClass are violated
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the interfaces array argument or any of its elements are null, or if the invocation handler, h, is null

        从object中得到类

      • getClassTypeVariable

        public static java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?>[] getClassTypeVariable(java.lang.Class<?> classInstance)
        返回所有的TypeVariable 。such as <K> <V> <K,V,T>
        参数:
        classInstance - 目标类的一个对象
        返回:
        the types of generic declaration that declared the underlying type variable.

      • getSystemVariable

        public static java.lang.String getSystemVariable(java.lang.String var)
        得到指定的系统参数值 e.g PATH、JAVA_HOME
        Gets the system property indicated by the specified key.
        First, if there is a security manager, its checkPropertyAccess method is called with the key as its argument. If there is no current set of system properties, a set of system properties is first created and initialized in the same manner as for the getProperties method.
        参数:
        var - 系统变量名
        返回:
        系统变量值

      • OuterClasses

        public static java.lang.Class<?> OuterClasses(java.lang.Class<?> classInstance)
        得到一个类的外部类 If the class or interface represented by this Class object is a member of another class, returns the Class object representing the class in which it was declared. This method returns null if this class or interface is not a member of any other class. If this Class object represents an array class, a primitive type, or void,then this method returns null.
        参数:
        classInstance - 目标类的一个对象
        返回:
        其外部类

        public static void printClassDeclaredFields(java.lang.Class<?> classInstance)

        参数:
        classInstance - 目标类的一个对象

      • reflect

        public static java.lang.String reflect(java.lang.String className,
                                       java.lang.Integer i)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        根据类名 返回 静态值i 对应的静态字段名称
        参数:
        className - 要去搜索的类
        i - 要查的值
        返回:
        静态字段的名称
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - 类不存在
